amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Section 10003, the Farmers Market and Local Food Promotion Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 43 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to strike Section 10003 which is the Farmers Market and Local Food Promotion Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 269 (Roll no. 272).
